seo.title: Vernazza Boat Tours 2025 | Cinque Terre Coastal Excursions
seo.description: Discover Cinque Terre by boat from Vernazza. Coastal tours, swimming stops, and the best views of all five villages from the Mediterranean.

body.title: Boat Tours from Vernazza
body.subtitle: See Cinque Terre from the sea. Depart from Vernazza's historic harbor for unforgettable coastal tours with swimming stops and spectacular views.

features.title: Village-Hopping Tours
features.description: Visit all five villages by boat with stops in each.

features.title: Swimming Excursions
features.description: Anchor in secluded coves for snorkeling and swimming.

features.title: Sunset Cruises
features.description: Evening tours with aperitivo and golden hour views.

features.title: Photography Angles
features.description: Best views of Vernazza's harbor from the water.

features.title: Private Charters
features.description: Custom tours for small groups and families.
